PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Create dashboard UI
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Design and develop the main dashboard for logged-in users. Display recent activity, quick links, and user profile summary.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Integrate payment gateway
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Add support for Stripe payments. Allow users to add a credit card, subscribe to a plan, and manage billing history.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Implement role-based access control
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Ensure that only admins can access management pages. Add middleware to check permissions at the route level.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Optimize image upload performance
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Implement client-side compression and server-side resizing for uploaded images to reduce bandwidth usage.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Add search functionality
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Implement a search bar that queries the backend for users, projects, and tasks. Display results in a dropdown with links.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Implement notifications system
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Develop a notifications dropdown that shows recent system alerts and user mentions. Add real-time updates via WebSocket.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Fix session timeout bug
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Investigate issue where user sessions expire prematurely after 15 minutes. Ensure refresh tokens extend active sessions.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Improve mobile responsiveness
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Audit UI components on small screens and fix overlapping buttons, misaligned grids, and text wrapping issues.

PROJECT_ALPHA.title: Add dark mode toggle
PROJECT_ALPHA.description: Introduce a theme switcher allowing users to toggle between light and dark mode. Persist choice in user preferences.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Refactor API error handling
PROJECT_BETA.description: Standardize error responses across all endpoints. Return consistent JSON objects with code, message, and details.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Add audit logging
PROJECT_BETA.description: Log all critical actions (logins, updates, deletions) with timestamp and user ID for compliance and troubleshooting.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Implement file export to CSV
PROJECT_BETA.description: Allow users to export reports to CSV format. Ensure large datasets are streamed efficiently.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Fix cross-browser compatibility issues
PROJECT_BETA.description: Resolve UI rendering bugs in Firefox and Safari where buttons and forms appear misaligned compared to Chrome.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Add two-factor authentication
PROJECT_BETA.description: Implement optional 2FA via SMS or authenticator apps. Update login flow to handle verification codes.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Improve database indexing
PROJECT_BETA.description: Analyze slow queries on the 'orders' and 'users' tables. Add indexes where appropriate and verify performance improvements.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Fix memory leak in background worker
PROJECT_BETA.description: Investigate high memory usage in the queue worker service. Identify leaks and release resources properly after tasks complete.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Add email template system
PROJECT_BETA.description: Introduce reusable templates for system emails (welcome, password reset, notifications). Allow dynamic variables.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Implement tagging system
PROJECT_BETA.description: Allow users to add tags to projects and tasks. Support filtering and searching by tags in the UI.

PROJECT_BETA.title: Improve accessibility compliance
PROJECT_BETA.description: Conduct WCAG audit. Fix issues with color contrast, keyboard navigation, and ARIA labels on form inputs.
